text:
The Interledger project doesn’t use Slack (the community decided against it) but I am happy to answer any questions and keep the dialogue between our projects open here if that’s useful to you?

We use Gitter: <https://gitter.im/interledger/Lobby>
and IRC: <http://irc.w3.org|irc.w3.org> <#C3CFQUWU9|interledger> 

We also have two mailing lists at W3C (<mailto:public-interledger@w3.org|public-interledger@w3.org>) and IETF (<mailto:ledger@ietf.org|ledger@ietf.org>).

Joining the W3C community group will cover you as a contributor and sign you up to the mailing list: <https://www.w3.org/community/interledger/> 

The IETF list is a bit more old skool: <https://www.ietf.org/mailman/listinfo/ledger>
